name: Location_Guide
text:
Location Guide
For descriptions of locations seen in the show, see Twin Peaks, Washington
"Location Guide" is a featurette originally released in the 2007 DVD set, Twin Peaks: Definitive Gold Box Edition. It was later re-released in the Blu-ray sets, Twin Peaks: The Entire Mystery and Twin Peaks: From Z to A.
As the title states, it is a guide to finding the real-life filming locations seen in Twin Peaks and Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me.
The locations shown are:
Welcome sign at SE Renig Rd., .25 Mile West of 428th & Renig, North Bend, WA
Blue Pine Lodge kitchen and exterior where Laura was found and Great Northern interiors at the Kiana Lodge 14976 Sandy Hook Rd. NE, Poulsbo, WA
Laura's log
Packard Sawmill at Weyerhaeuser Paper Mill 7001 396th Dr. SE Snoqualmie, WA
Sheriff's station at Weyerhaeuser Paper Mill offices 7001 396th Dr. SE Snoqualmie, WA
Great Northern Hotel exterior at Snoqualmie Falls, Salish Inn and spa, 6501 Railroad Ave., Snoqualmie, WA
Ronette's bridge at 396th Dr. and SE Renig Rd., Snoqualmie, WA
Double R Diner at Twede's café (formerly Mar-T) 137 West North Bend Way, North Bend, WA
The Roadhouse at Colonial Inn 4200 Preston Fall City Rd. SE Fall City, WA
A short interview segment with Phoebe Augustine is seen in the segment for Ronette's bridge.
